CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 3, 1962, pg. C2, reads: "Four Smiths - Winners of awards were these four Smiths, none related to each other. They are (left to right): Dr. Earl B. Smith, surgery; Atty. Henry R. Smith Jr., Civil Liberties; Robert W. Smith Jr., Science, and Clifford Smith, Theatre."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Dr. Earl B. Smith, Atty. Henry R. Smith Jr., Robert W. Smith Jr., and Clifford Smith, holding award plaques received during Pittsburgh Courier Newspaper's Appreciation Day Rally at Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall
CatSubject_tab: Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Smith, Henry R. Jr.Awards--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
